subject: Self Care
title: The Amygdala Hijack
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Amygdala Hijack.

hook.text: Your boss says one word and suddenly your heart races, fists clench, and rational thought vanishes completely.

buildup.text: The amygdala is the brain's alarm system. It reacts to threats faster than the rational prefrontal cortex can.

discovery.text: An amygdala hijack happens when emotions override logic. You react before you think, often destructively.

twist.text: The amygdala can't tell the difference between a physical threat and an insulting email. It reacts identically.

climax.text: The six-second pause. That's how long it takes for cortisol to clear. Pause before responding to anything heated.

punchline.text: Feel the surge. Count to six. Then respond wisely.

quiz.question: What is an amygdala hijack?
options: When emotions override rational thinking before you can process
